createAList.description: Create a new mailing list with custom settings and descriptions

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the list to be created

props.name: description
props.description: Internal description of the list for your reference

props.name: publicName
props.description: The public-facing name of the list visible to subscribers

props.name: publicDescription
props.description: Public description of the list visible to subscribers

props.name: isPublic
props.description: Make this list publicly visible

props.name: allowsUsersToSubscribe
props.description: Allow users to subscribe to this list themselves

props.name: allowsUsersToUnsubscribe
props.description: Allow users to unsubscribe from this list themselves

props.name: isPortal
props.description: Enable portal access for this list

findSubscriber.description: Search for subscribers by unique identifiers (ID, email, phone, external ID) or name

props.name: searchType
props.description: Choose how to search for subscribers

props.name: id
props.description: The unique ID of the contact

props.name: email
props.description: The email address of the contact

props.name: cellphone
props.description: The phone number of the contact (cellphone)

props.name: externalId
props.description: The external ID of the contact

props.name: firstName
props.description: Search by first name

props.name: lastName
props.description: Search by last name

props.name: fields
props.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return (e.g., id,email,firstName,lastName). Leave empty for all fields.

props.name: includeCustomFields
props.description: Include custom fields in the response

props.name: includeLinkedLists
props.description: Include linked lists in the response

props.name: skip
props.description: Number of records to skip (for pagination, default: 0)

props.name: take
props.description: Maximum number of records to return (default: 100, max: 100)

props.name: sort
props.description: Sort the results by a specific field

unsubscribe.description: Unsubscribe a contact from all lists and move them to the "Unsubscribed" list

props.name: reason
props.description: Reason for unsubscribing the contact

newFormCreated.description: Fires when a new form/landing page is created in your Smoove account

props.name: formType
props.description: Filter by specific form type, or select "All" to monitor all form types

newLeadSubmitted.description: Fires when a lead submits via form, popup, or mobile campaign

props.name: monitoringMode
props.description: Choose whether to monitor all forms or a specific form

props.name: includeCustomFields
props.description: Include custom field data in the lead submission

props.name: includeContactDetails
props.description: Include complete contact information in the submission data

newListCreated.description: Fires when a new mailing list is created in your Smoove account

props.name: fields
props.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include (e.g., id,name,description,contactsCount). Leave empty for all fields.

props.name: sortBy
props.description: How to sort the lists for monitoring

props.name: maxItems
props.description: Maximum number of lists to check for new additions (1-100)

newSubscriber.description: Fires when a new subscriber is added to your Smoove account

props.name: fields
props.description: Comma-separated fields to include (e.g., id,email,firstName,lastName,timestampSignup). Leave empty for default fields.

props.name: includeCustomFields
props.description: Include custom field data in subscriber information

props.name: includeLinkedLists
props.description: Include list associations in subscriber information

props.name: joinSourceFilter
props.description: Filter subscribers by how they joined (leave as "All" to monitor all sources)

props.name: sortBy
props.description: How to sort contacts for monitoring new subscribers

props.name: maxItems
props.description: Maximum number of contacts to check for new subscribers (1-100)
